lender.name: Jordan

lender.occupational_info: I am a college student, so I don't really have a steady job.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: People matter.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to promote heritage crafts like pottery, weaving, embroidery, etc. Also interested in sustainable agriculture and energy, raising education levels, improving health care, and equal rights.
lender.occupational_info: I write software to help doctors record their interactions with patients.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Kiva's lack of interest collection combined with direct microloans to small business owners is one of the better ways to combat poverty that I have seen. I respect what Kiva is doing and am glad to contribute.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a solutions provider at a university in the field of computers and technology. I find ways for us to accomplish our goals and provide guidance on the best way for us to get where we're going. I'm also a writer and occasional public speaker about a variety of topics.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world

lender.name: Maria

lender.name: Emily

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: How often have you seen a headline like this?--TWO DIE ATTEMPTING RESCUE OF DROWNING CHILD. If a man gets lost in the mountains, hundreds will search and often two or three searchers are killed. But the next time somebody gets lost just as many volunteers turn out. Poor arithmetic, but very human. It runs through all our folklore, all human religions, all our literature--a racial conviction that when one human needs rescue, others should not count the price." — Robert A. Heinlein

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Loves the idea that a small contribution can yield big results for someone out there that needs it and is willing to work for it.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for a non-profit company that guarantees loans students take out to go to college in the US.

lender.name: Microfinance Connection
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
Binghamton Microfinance Connection is a student group at Binghamton University.
We're dedicated to spreading the awareness of microfinance as a tangible way to help alleviate world poverty, and making microloans to fund new entrepreneurs in developing countries globally. We've focused on bringing guest speakers to the Binghamton campus, and hosting events to raise money to lend to entrepreneurs all over the world.
Our projects are fueled directly by the ideas of our members.
Stop by our Facebook page:
http://www.facebook.com/BUmicrofinance
Or visit our website:

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I think that people should always have a chance to make their way in the world. I'm fortunate and want to help people to feel good about themselves.

lender.name: Chase
lender.loan_because: We are all eternally connected and I know that I can not be successful without making the rest of the world a success as well; it’s all very selfish actually ; )
lender.occupational_info: I work with all types of technologies that can be found in a modern home including lighting control, multi room audio and video, cameras, etc. I enjoy very much what I do, especially learning new technologies, though I am aware that the majority is unessential.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
I can.
I'm not the guy who will find a cure for cancer or aids. I am, however, a guy who is able to offer assistance to another human being. Hopefully, through this assistance, I will be one of many factors that allows for a better life for that individual, their family and communities.
How cool is that

lender.name: Robert, Sonia, Jadzia
lender.loan_because: This is the right way to do things. "Teach a person to fish, and they will never be hungry."

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: when things are tough for me if makes me feel better to help someone else
lender.occupational_info: I film stories about businesses and organizations that you can see on the Internet

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel it is an effective way to provide balance in the financial system.
lender.occupational_info: After retiring from active development of computer systems for a variety of industries, large and small, I have started tutoring high school and college students on math and science.

lender.name: Paul

lender.name: John

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: It's a great cause. The best way to help people struggling for money is to give them some so that they can invest themselves in something with it. It is true that money makes money; I have excess money, so it is the only fair to give it to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: The actuarial work I hope to do will be assessing risk and using taking that to aid in pricing insurance products.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: this program is sustainable and impactful.

lender.name: Alex

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to start a business.

lender.name: Tami
lender.loan_because: When I look around and see everything I have, I know I have a lot. I know what it's like to need help and I know how it feels to struggle. I can't be there to encourage, or listen to the hardships, to be a friend, but I can give to help a dream, or a need and with it goes my friendship.
lender.occupational_info: I work each day at several jobs, I am an artist, a mother, and I have a full time job as well as my own business. Each day is hard, but I face each day and work with happiness that I can work.

lender.occupational_info: I am a professional athlete but also run my own business.

lender.loan_because: I have almost everything I've ever dreamed of in my life and I would like to help others to realize their dreams, too.
lender.occupational_info: I am working for an automotive supplier in the production engineering department. I'm responsible for the development and implementation of new equipment and test strategies.

lender.name: Dan D.
lender.loan_because: of Kurt Vonnegut. "Hello, babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. At the outside, babies, you've got about a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies — God damn it, you've got to be kind."
lender.occupational_info: I work at an art museum and make documentaries about art/artists.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people improve their lives.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Laura

lender.name: Jeff and Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe if given the chance people want to make a honest go of it in the world, and if I can give a hand up to someone I am willing to put myself out there!

lender.name: Dan

lender.name: Valentine
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other.

lender.name: Ellen & Willow
lender.loan_because: love is my religion
lender.occupational_info: I work with young boys who are recovering addicts

lender.name: Carmen
lender.loan_because: this world would be a much better place if everyone lent a hand. I loan because it's not easy to ask for help. I loan because it gives someone a renewed sense of hope. I loan because a little goes a long way. I loan because I want my children to learn to empathize. I loan because I can. I loan because I am blessed. I loan because I believe everyone deserves a chance at their dream. I loan because I care. I loan because I want to do my part. I loan because it makes me feel good about myself.

lender.name: Dr. Ali Syed
lender.occupation: President & Head Chemist of Avlon & Syntonics

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help people out and this is an easy way that, in time, can help out many different people across the world!
lender.occupational_info: I am in school studying business and finance. I will graduate in a little over a year.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: Gotta keep the Karma in check =) There's nothing better than watching people better themselves through hard work and dedication. I've been blessed with a great family and an abundance of opportunity, and loaning $ to those less fortunate is a great way to share the love.

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: it seems like a great way to put my money to work for a great cause.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I admire the entrepreneurs who we lend to. They inspire me. I lived in West Africa as a child so I feel a need to help people from my childhood home. I hope the money I can lend will help them grow their businesses and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer. I work for the government, but I would like to begin a new career soon. I'd very much like to travel more - perhaps back to West Africa.

lender.name: Keith Kline
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great organization and I am happy to help.
lender.occupational_info: Keith is a insurance agent.

lender.name: Dahlia
lender.loan_because: it creates a healthy connection to the rest of the world. "I do good, I feel good. I do bad, I feel bad, and that is my religion"
lender.occupational_info: I am devoted to learning all I can while at school. I love studying literature, history, geography, physics, French, astronomy, politics... everything but pure math really.

lender.name: Norita
lender.loan_because: I believe in a pay forward gifting society..
lender.occupational_info: I am a spiritual seeker, a mother, a chocoholic, lover of life.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: I dont want to be the person that just takes everything for granted, i want to give back.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to truly help someone in need .

lender.name: PROTUS
lender.loan_because: I love helping. I have realized that if I just help enough people achieve/Get what they want I will have save a Life or two.
lender.occupational_info: Born to Serve.

lender.name: Pat
lender.occupational_info: I help create documentaries for television.

lender.name: Constance
lender.loan_because: I understand when people need help and are willing to work hard from my past experience as a single mother.
lender.occupational_info: I fix the English and create images in documents via a computer . The documents are used to build spacecrafts and satellites. In 2011 I will begin to teach computer science at a university.

lender.name: Sammy Boie
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel really really good
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers

lender.name: Ramki
lender.loan_because: I believe that empowered communities are key to peace, and human dignity is an end in itself.
lender.occupational_info: I write computer programs for surveyors who use laser equipment made by my company. In my free time, I do some social work, and comment on politics.

lender.name: Mark Micallef
lender.loan_because: It's a direct and practical way to assist communities in structural poverty to earn their way to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build websites for my clients to take their brand online and operate their business in the online marketplace.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: i love small business and helping others and this is the best way to achieve both!

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: this is what Jesus would want me to do.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: It's important to help when you can.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses get online.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: To give opportunity to others
lender.occupational_info: Web based news publishing.

lender.name: Fernando
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves an opportunity. Lets lend a hand to the people in need out there, just like in the past someone did to us.
lender.occupational_info: Management and growth of personal business

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Micro finance is a great way to spread capital to developing regions and get it right to the people who can use it most efficiently.
lender.occupational_info: I built a medical software company called Vital Images. It supplies viewing and analysis software for radiological images. I am now retired from full-time work, but still consult with the company.

lender.name: Sian and Jesse
lender.loan_because: We are just starting out, and don't have much extra money to give. It sometimes feels like the little bit we can afford couldn't possibly make a difference. Kiva is a great idea because we can see who we're helping and how. Good luck to all of the entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: Sian is a preschool teacher, teaching English to kids ages 3-5. Jesse is a digital archivist, scanning and storing all kinds of documents to computer, and he plays accordion in a rockin' eight-man band. We were married in September of 2008.

lender.name: shree
lender.loan_because: it can be the answer someone is hoping for, in order to continue/grow their business and get ahead in life. Kiva provides us the platform to support them.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: I want to help people without making them feel they have to depend on gifts/hand-outs from the developed world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students how to look at language and the way it is used.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I recently realized I've got more resources than I need, so I figured I should spread them around, and this is an easy and personal way to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school and listen to my teachers and learn lots of stuff.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: I can. And I should.

lender.name: jonah
lender.loan_because: There is not a good reason not to. And it's safer then a 401K.
lender.occupational_info: Design and implement process improvements for light industrial manufacturing equipment.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.whereabouts: U S A F Academy CO

lender.name: Marianna
lender.loan_because: it might mean something to somebody.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a used bookstore in Tokyo and I teach English to adult learners. I also paint.

lender.name: Lewis
lender.loan_because: Other people can make better use of my money than I can.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: It's a small world...
lender.occupational_info: I stab people and take blood samples for testing

lender.name: Jock
lender.loan_because: I want to help other members of the human race less well off.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in the idea of lending to those who are willing to help themselves and their community. I am confident in the individual as they strive to innovate and create for a better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: I am a soldier in the US Army who is currently deployed in Afghanistan fighting for the freedom of the people who are oppressed by their government, and to fight against the global ravages of international terror.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: You never know where a helping hand will come from and sometimes just a little bit can give a lot of hope.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company sell more of its services.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology for a Bank.

lender.name: Wanchalee
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I want to support other small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I run a family child care program from my home. I currently care for 4 children

lender.name: Mark and Shannon
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with his love and abundance.

lender.name: EARL
lender.loan_because: it's god will to do so at this time.
lender.occupational_info: income for life!

lender.name: bharath
lender.loan_because: I like helping people who are helping themselves by working hard to improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in financial crime and compliance software industry as Technical Consultant. Work involves creating product suite that detect and combat financial crime, control defenses and evolve strategies against fraud, money laundering and other types of financial crime.

lender.name: GodThankU
lender.loan_because: We are brothers and sisters under fatherhood of God.

lender.name: Richenda
lender.loan_because: People who buy my art work directly support my dreams. I would like to do the same for others.

lender.name: Bernice
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I want to make this world a better place and I am not so much of a fan of the social interaction involved in helping. I just rather write a check.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Director of Public Relations, The Women's Center

lender.name: Zane
lender.loan_because: it helps the world and the world needs it

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: it empowers people to take control of their own lives; it gives them self-esteem and a feeling of self-value.
lender.occupational_info: I advise governments, sponsors and lenders on the financing of infrastucture assets throughout Asia.
